name: axiom
description: Battle-tested Claude Code skills for modern xOS (iOS, iPadOS, watchOS, tvOS) development
author: Charles Wiltgen

skills.name: xcode-debugging
skills.description: Use when encountering BUILD FAILED, test crashes, simulator hangs, stale builds, zombie xcodebuild processes, or mysterious Xcode issues - systematic environment-first diagnostics

skills.name: swift-concurrency
skills.description: Swift 6 strict concurrency patterns - progressive journey from single-threaded to concurrent code with @concurrent attribute (WWDC 2025), actor isolation, Sendable, async/await, and data race prevention

skills.name: database-migration
skills.description: Safe database schema evolution for SQLite/GRDB - prevents data loss with additive migrations and testing workflows

skills.name: memory-debugging
skills.description: Use when app memory grows over time, seeing multiple instances of same class, experiencing crashes with memory limit exceeded, or Instruments shows retain cycles - systematic diagnosis of memory leaks

skills.name: ui-testing
skills.description: Use when writing UI tests, recording interactions (WWDC 2025), tests have race conditions, timing dependencies, or are flaky - covers Recording UI Automation in Xcode 26, condition-based waiting, and accessibility-first testing patterns

skills.name: build-troubleshooting
skills.description: Use when encountering dependency conflicts, CocoaPods/SPM resolution failures, Multiple commands produce errors, or framework version mismatches - systematic dependency and build configuration debugging

skills.name: liquid-glass
skills.description: Use when implementing Liquid Glass effects (WWDC 2025), reviewing UI for adoption, debugging visual artifacts, or requesting expert review - Apple's new material design system with comprehensive design principles, API patterns, Regular vs Clear variants, tinting, and troubleshooting for iOS 26+

skills.name: liquid-glass-ref
skills.description: Reference: Comprehensive Liquid Glass adoption guide covering app icons, controls, navigation, menus, windows, search, and platform considerations for iOS 26+

skills.name: swiftui-performance
skills.description: Use when analyzing SwiftUI performance (WWDC 2025), identifying long view body updates, reducing unnecessary updates, or optimizing rendering - covers new SwiftUI Instrument in Instruments 26, Cause & Effect Graph, and performance patterns for iOS 26+

skills.name: swiftui-debugging
skills.description: Use when debugging SwiftUI view updates, intermittent rendering issues, preview crashes, or layout problems - diagnostic decision trees for struct mutation, binding identity, view recreation, missing observers, and pressure scenarios for App Store deadlines

skills.name: performance-profiling
skills.description: Use when app feels slow, memory grows over time, battery drains fast, or profiling proactively - decision trees to choose the right Instruments tool (Time Profiler, Allocations, Core Data, Energy Impact), deep workflows for each tool, and pressure scenarios for misinterpreting results under deadline

skills.name: sqlitedata
skills.description: Use when working with SQLiteData (Point-Free) — @Table models, query composition, RETURNING clause, recursive CTEs, compound selects, FTS5 search with highlight/snippet/bm25, JSON aggregation, column groups, single-table inheritance, CloudKit sync with migratePrimaryKeys, database views, @DatabaseFunction aggregates, Case expressions, self-joins with TableAlias, string functions, null handling, @Ephemeral

skills.name: grdb
skills.description: Use when writing raw SQL queries with GRDB, complex joins, ValueObservation for reactive queries, DatabaseMigrator patterns, or dropping down from SQLiteData for performance - direct SQLite access for iOS/macOS

skills.name: swiftdata
skills.description: Use when working with SwiftData - @Model definitions, @Query in SwiftUI, @Relationship macros, ModelContext patterns, CloudKit integration, iOS 26+ features, and Swift 6 concurrency with @MainActor - Apple's native persistence framework

skills.name: swiftdata-to-sqlitedata
skills.description: Use when migrating from SwiftData to SQLiteData — decision guide, pattern equivalents, code examples, CloudKit sharing (SwiftData can't), performance benchmarks, gradual migration strategy

skills.name: networking
skills.description: Use when implementing Network.framework connections, debugging connection failures, migrating from sockets/URLSession streams, or adopting structured concurrency networking patterns - prevents deprecated API usage, reachability anti-patterns, and thread-safety violations with iOS 12-26+ APIs

skills.name: foundation-models
skills.description: Use when implementing on-device AI with Apple's Foundation Models framework - prevents context overflow, blocking UI, wrong model use cases, and manual JSON parsing when @Generable should be used. Covers LanguageModelSession, @Generable structured output, streaming, tool calling, and context management for iOS 26+, macOS 26+, iPadOS 26+, visionOS 26+

skills.name: uikit-animation-debugging
skills.description: Use when CAAnimation completion handler doesn't fire, spring physics look wrong on device, animation duration mismatches actual time, gesture + animation interaction causes jank, or timing differs between simulator and real hardware - systematic CAAnimation diagnosis with CATransaction patterns, frame rate awareness, and device-specific behavior

skills.name: objc-block-retain-cycles
skills.description: Use when debugging memory leaks from blocks, blocks assigned to self or properties, network callbacks, or crashes from deallocated objects - systematic weak-strong pattern diagnosis with mandatory diagnostic rules

skills.name: core-data-diag
skills.description: Diagnostic: Schema migration crashes, thread-confinement errors, N+1 query performance - systematic Core Data diagnostics with production crisis defense and safe migration patterns

skills.name: realm-migration-ref
skills.description: Reference: Comprehensive migration guide from Realm to SwiftData (URGENT: Realm Device Sync sunset Sept 30, 2025) - pattern equivalents, threading model conversion, schema migration strategies, CloudKit sync transition, and real-world scenarios

skills.name: accessibility-diag
skills.description: Diagnostic: VoiceOver, Dynamic Type, color contrast, touch targets - WCAG compliance with App Store rejection defense and design review push-back frameworks

skills.name: foundation-models-diag
skills.description: Diagnostic: Use when debugging Foundation Models issues - context exceeded, guardrail violations, slow generation, availability problems, unsupported language, or unexpected output. Systematic diagnostics with production crisis defense

skills.name: networking-diag
skills.description: Diagnostic: Use when debugging connection timeouts, TLS handshake failures, data not arriving, connection drops, performance issues, or proxy/VPN interference - systematic Network.framework diagnostics with production crisis defense

skills.name: app-intents-ref
skills.description: Reference: Comprehensive App Intents integration guide for Siri, Apple Intelligence, Shortcuts, Spotlight - covers AppIntent, AppEntity, parameter handling, entity queries, background execution, authentication, and debugging for iOS 16+

skills.name: foundation-models-ref
skills.description: Reference: Complete Foundation Models framework guide covering LanguageModelSession, @Generable, @Guide, Tool protocol, streaming, dynamic schemas, built-in use cases, and all WWDC 2025 code examples for iOS 26+, macOS 26+, iPadOS 26+, visionOS 26+

skills.name: swiftui-26-ref
skills.description: Reference: Comprehensive iOS 26 SwiftUI features guide - covers Liquid Glass design system, performance improvements, @Animatable macro, 3D spatial layout, scene bridging, WebView/WebPage, AttributedString rich text editing, drag and drop enhancements, and visionOS integration

skills.name: network-framework-ref
skills.description: Reference: Comprehensive Network.framework guide covering NetworkConnection (iOS 26+), NWConnection (iOS 12-25), TLV framing, Coder protocol, NetworkListener, NetworkBrowser, Wi-Fi Aware discovery, and migration strategies

skills.name: avfoundation-ref
skills.description: Reference: AVFoundation audio APIs — AVAudioSession categories/modes, AVAudioEngine pipelines, bit-perfect DAC output, iOS 26+ spatial audio capture with ASAF/APAC, AirPods high-quality recording, Audio Mix with Cinematic framework
